title: Breakfast bar and built-in wine rack, Built-in desk, Vaulted ceilings
posting_body: Verona Apartments offers the utmost in Henderson living with one, two, and three bedroom apartments.
You will enjoy the renovated redesigned interiors and life-enhancing upgrades around the property.
Wood-style plank flooring, spacious floor plans, and in-home laundry options are just a few apartment features you'll love.

-Stainless steel appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity
-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity

-Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity
-Controlled-entry access with reserved covered parking and private attached garages available                                                                                         Featured amenity
